calibration.prompt_colour_settings: Adjust the colours below to match your red/green glasses
calibration.prompt_language_settings: Please select the language to be used:
calibration.prompt_horizontal_resolution: Please enter the horizontal resolution of your screen:
calibration.prompt_screen_width: Please enter the physical width of your screen in mm:
calibration.label_resolution_calibration_image: When properly calibrated, the line below should measure 100mm end-to-end:
calibration.prompt_save_changes: Do you want to save your changes?
calibration.prompt_reset_defaults: This will reset all settings to their default values. Are you sure?

aat.prompt_horizontal_resolution: Please enter the horizontal resolution of your screen:
aat.prompt_screen_width: Please enter the physical width of your screen in mm:
aat.prompt_test_instruction: Press enter when the image goes out of focus
aat.prompt_confirm_exit: Are you sure you want to end this test? (record will be incomplete)
aat.message_test_complete: Thank you, your results have been recorded.
aat.message_invalid_input: The value you entered was invalid. Please rerun the test.
aat.message_incomplete_test: You did not press a key. Please retake the test.
aat.message_missing_calibration_data: Could not find resolution calibration data. Please complete the resolution calibration step.

vat.message_missing_calibration_data: Could not find resolution calibration data. Please complete the resolution calibration step.
